price: Nanso wͻdane wͻn ho firi ne ho, na wͻka sε: obi na ɛkyerε no, ͻyε bͻdamfoͻ?
arabic: ثُمَّ تَوَلَّوۡاْ عَنۡهُ وَقَالُواْ مُعَلَّمٞ مَّجۡنُونٌ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: thumma tawallaw ʿanhu waqālū muʿallamun majnūnun
